mapper.select: select * from category where id=(select parent_category_ID from category where id = #{id})
mapper.insert: insert into category (id, category_name, parent_category_ID, category_level, commodity_num) values (null, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{level}, 0)
mapper.update: update category set commodity_num = ( select a.commodity_num from (select * from category where id = #{id}) a ) + 1 where id = #{id}
